net.markenwerk.utils.mail.smime

Class SmimeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.markenwerk.utils.mail.smime.SmimeUtil

  • public final class SmimeUtil
extends Object
    Utilities for handling S/MIME specific operations on MIME messages from JavaMail.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Allen Petersen (akp at sourceforge dot net), Torsten Krause (tk at markenwerk dot net)

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public static MimeMessage encrypt(Session session,
                                  MimeMessage mimeMessage,
                                  X509Certificate certificate)
        Encrypts a MIME message and yields a new S/MIME encrypted MIME message.
        Parameters:
        session - The Session that is used in conjunction with the original MimeMessage.
        mimeMessage - The original MimeMessage to be encrypted.
        certificate - The X509Certificate used to obtain the PublicKey to encrypt the original message with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME encrypted MimeMessage.

      • encrypt

        public static MimeBodyPart encrypt(MimeBodyPart mimeBodyPart,
                                   X509Certificate certificate)
        Encrypts a MIME body part and yields a new S/MIME encrypted MIME body part.
        Parameters:
        mimeBodyPart - The original MimeBodyPart to be encrypted.
        certificate - The X509Certificate used to obtain the PublicKey to encrypt the original body part with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME encrypted MimeBodyPart.

      • decrypt

        public static MimeMessage decrypt(Session session,
                                  MimeMessage mimeMessage,
                                  SmimeKey smimeKey)
        Decrypts a S/MIME encrypted MIME message and yields a new MIME message.
        Parameters:
        session - The Session that is used in conjunction with the encrypted MimeMessage.
        mimeMessage - The encrypted MimeMessage to be decrypted.
        smimeKey - The SmimeKey used to obtain the PrivateKey to decrypt the encrypted message with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME decrypted MimeMessage.

      • decrypt

        public static MimeBodyPart decrypt(MimeBodyPart mimeBodyPart,
                                   SmimeKey smimeKey)
        Decrypts a S/MIME encrypted MIME body part and yields a new MIME body part.
        Parameters:
        mimeBodyPart - The encrypted MimeBodyPart to be decrypted.
        smimeKey - The SmimeKey used to obtain the PrivateKey to decrypt the encrypted body part with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME decrypted MimeBodyPart.

      • decrypt

        public static MimeBodyPart decrypt(MimeMultipart mimeMultipart,
                                   SmimeKey smimeKey)
        Decrypts a S/MIME encrypted MIME multipart and yields a new MIME body part.
        Parameters:
        mimeMultipart - The encrypted MimeMultipart to be decrypted.
        smimeKey - The SmimeKey used to obtain the PrivateKey to decrypt the encrypted multipart with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME decrypted MimeBodyPart.

      • sign

        public static MimeBodyPart sign(MimeBodyPart mimeBodyPart,
                                SmimeKey smimeKey)
        Signs a MIME body part and yields a new S/MIME signed MIME body part.
        Parameters:
        mimeBodyPart - The original MimeBodyPart to be signed.
        smimeKey - The SmimeKey used to obtain the PrivateKey to sign the original body part with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME signed MimeBodyPart.

      • sign

        public static MimeMessage sign(Session session,
                               MimeMessage mimeMessage,
                               SmimeKey smimeKey)
        Signs a MIME message and yields a new S/MIME signed MIME message.
        Parameters:
        session - The Session that is used in conjunction with the original MimeMessage.
        mimeMessage - The original MimeMessage to be signed.
        smimeKey - The SmimeKey used to obtain the PrivateKey to sign the original message with.
        Returns:
        The new S/MIME signed MimeMessage.

      • checkSignature

        public static boolean checkSignature(MimeMultipart mimeMultipart)
        Checks the signature on a S/MIME signed MIME multipart.
        Parameters:
        mimeMultipart - The MimeMultipart to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the multipart is correctly signed, false otherwise.

      • checkSignature

        public static boolean checkSignature(MimePart mimePart)
        Checks the signature on a S/MIME signed MIME part (i.e. MIME message).
        Parameters:
        mimePart - The MimePart to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the part is correctly signed, false otherwise.

      • getSignedContent

        public static MimeBodyPart getSignedContent(MimeMultipart mimeMultipart)
        Returns the signed MIME body part of a S/MIME signed MIME multipart.
        Parameters:
        mimeMultipart - The MimeMultipart to be stripped off.
        Returns:
        The signed MimeBodyPart contained in the MimeMultipart.

      • getSignedContent

        public static MimeBodyPart getSignedContent(MimePart mimePart)

        Parameters:
        mimePart - The MimePart to be stripped off.
        Returns:
        The signed MimeBodyPart contained in the MimePart .
